SOS

WORLDWIDE NFT GEO CAMPAIGN

●●● – – – ●●●

Be the first to find our Sloth stickers and we will reward you with a Society Of Sloths NFT. We have 20 stickers placed around major cities. Map locations will be revealed every week!

When you find one, message our “Geo Campaign” Discord section. Don’t forget to take a video for verification!

Goodluck!
